alert.note: Alert for Louisa; Muscatine; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 9:18PM CDT until July 28 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ROCK ISLAND...MERCER...SOUTHWESTERN HENRY... LOUISA...SOUTHERN WASHINGTON AND SOUTHERN MUSCATINE COUNTIES... At 918 PM CDT, strong thunderstorm outflow winds were located along a line extending from near Marston to near Brighton, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Muscatine, Washington, Aledo, Wapello, Columbus Junction, Andalusia, Fruitland, Viola, Woodhull, Millersburg, Matherville, New Boston, Alpha, Brighton, Sherrard, Ainsworth, Grandview, Reynolds, Conesville and Eliza. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
